meanings.definition: The state of being happy or content.
meanings.sent1: Her hippinesses was evident in her constant smile.
meanings.sent2: The hippinesses of the children playing in the park was contagious.
meanings.sent3: The hippinesses of the puppy as it chased its tail was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The hippinesses of the flowers blooming in the garden brought joy to all who passed by.
meanings.sent5: The hippinesses of the sun shining brightly lifted everyone's spirits.

meanings.definition: The quality or state of being hip or trendy.
meanings.sent1: His hippinesses was reflected in his cool fashion sense.
meanings.sent2: The hippinesses of the new restaurant attracted a young crowd.
meanings.sent3: The hippinesses of the retro music playing in the cafe gave it a fun vibe.
meanings.sent4: The hippinesses of the city's street art scene made it a popular destination.
meanings.sent5: The hippinesses of her dance moves made her the star of the party.
